<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Retrieve Stellar Info File</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/.well-known/stellar.toml"}></MethodEndpoint>



Allows the wallet to fetch the SEP-10 server url, SEP-10 signing public key and SEP-24 server url.

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Token is valid and the webpage will be loaded normally.
